about_the_game:
This template is the official GameCreator game template - Star pupil. It can be used for visual production of AVG, visual novel and other types of games.
The template contains the features of GameCreator engine and the core system unique to the template as well as the editor.

Event Editor

Event Editor is used for quick creation of game content in a non-programming, visual event command way. Script and show effects as well as real-time previews are implemented here.

Lens Management

Support depth and show the hierarchy through the lens.

Material Effects

Support Material Shader effect, advanced developers can customize

Others

Character management: conveniently manage multiple actions, frames and parts
Interface management: visual production interface
Video support: support mp4 and webm videos
Voice support: voice files can be binding for text
Animation system: support for sequential frame animation and particle animation
Advanced extension: advanced developers can extend content through scripts and plug-ins
......

Some of the games made using this template

《日日夜夜》：
《记得我》：
《罪狱：soul》：
《重启：泡沫篇 Reboot:FROTH》：

name: GameCreator - AVG - 星之瞳 - Eyes of star

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i3-3200+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT750及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 X64
  • Processor: intel CORE i5-4460+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980及以上
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: This template is the official GameCreator game template - Star pupil. It can be used for visual production of AVG, visual novel and other types of games. The template contains the features of GameCreator engine and the core system unique to the template as well as the editor.
